entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
